name: Arcana Mortal Coil Toro
additionalNotes:
This cigar takes a rustic leaf of Andullo tobacco and rolls it into long cylinders wraps them tightly in palm tree pods and hangs them up like a sausage to undergo fermentation for two years. This results in typically sweet, dense logs of concentrated Dominican tobacco. These "logs" are then combined with a Connecticut shade binder and a filler blend of Honduran tobacco from the Jamastran Valley, Nicaraguan tobacco from Estel√≠ and some Dominican Piloto Cubano and encases it all inside of dark Connecticut broadleaf wrapper.

https://www.smallbatchcigar.com/cao-arcana-mortal-coil
